C

computeTestMethods() - Method in class org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit.Ordered
 
Contract - Annotation Type in org.apache.bigtop.itest
Specifies the contract for a test: what environment variables and system properties are used or expected by the test.

G

getChildren() - Method in class org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit.OrderedParameterized
 

O

Ordered - Class in org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit
This is a variation of a OrderedParametrized JUnit runner that lets arrange individual tests into ordered sequence of run stages via adding a @RunStage(level=X) annotation to the desired testcases (default run stage is 0).
Ordered(Class) - Constructor for class org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit.Ordered
 
Ordered.RunStage - Annotation Type in org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit
Annotation for a method which provides parameters to be injected into the test class constructor by Ordered
OrderedParameterized - Class in org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit
This is a modification of a Parameterized JUnit runner (which has been relicensed under APL for this very hack BIGTOP-18) that takes care of two things: 1.
OrderedParameterized(Class<?>) - Constructor for class org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit.OrderedParameterized
 
OrderedParameterized.RunStage - Annotation Type in org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit

org.apache.bigtop.itest - package org.apache.bigtop.itest
 
org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit - package org.apache.bigtop.itest.junit
 

P

ParameterSetter - Class in org.apache.bigtop.itest
Class containing utility methods for test classes to use (in a static setup method) for obtaining the values of parameters passed in via environment variables or system properties.
ParameterSetter() - Constructor for class org.apache.bigtop.itest.ParameterSetter
 
Property - Annotation Type in org.apache.bigtop.itest
Specifies a parameter to be passed into a test via a system property.
Property.Type - Enum in org.apache.bigtop.itest
 

S

setEnv(Class) - Static method in class org.apache.bigtop.itest.ParameterSetter
Sets the values of parameters passed in via environment variables, using convention.
setEnv(Class, String[]) - Static method in class org.apache.bigtop.itest.ParameterSetter
Sets the values of parameters passed in via environment variables.

Sets the values of parameters passed in via system properties, using convention.
setProperties(Class, String[]) - Static method in class org.apache.bigtop.itest.ParameterSetter
Sets the values of parameters passed in via system properties.
